article_title: Healthy Lifestyle Adoption Push May Not Save Employers Money

article_metadata.description: Though workplace wellness programs are lowering costs for employees with chronic conditions, encouraging workers to adopt a healthy lifestyle “may not reduce health costs or lead to lower net savings,” researchers at RAND Corp. say. The RAND study, which is published in the January issue of the journal Health Affairs, examined [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
